name: Colorful Scribble - Two Player
description:
The first load will be slower, please wait for 10 seconds. Intro

"Colorful Scribble" is a 2-player game full of excitement and fun. The goal is to compete for more areas in 1min.

One player controls BLUE, another one controls ORANGE. The area where players go through will turn their own color. The overlapping areas will turn black and disappear after 5s.

Please note that game props will only appear in areas where the black disappears. Grab them to play a trick on your friend! That will be very funny!

Controls Blue PlayerOrange PlayerMove: WASD
Use props: Space KeyMove: ↑↓←→
Using props: Enter Key Props

Magic Stick: Turn the horizontal and vertical squares into their own colors.

Stone: Make the opponent unable to move for 5s.
